Title: The Love Circle Overlap
Plot: Nancy learns that the tunnel is being used for more than drugs. Esteban puts her fears to rest as well as her nagging headache with a strong remedy. Celia's family stages an intervention in order to force her into rehab. Andy finds Maria and takes her across the border to an awaiting Doug. Silas babysits while Shane explores new territory with his two girlfriends.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Guillermo Diaz, Lee Majors, Bob Odenkirk
